resources.string: "Bangalore, also known as Bengaluru (Kannada) is the capital of the Indian State of Karnataka. Bangalore is nicknamed the Garden City and was once called a Pensioner\'s Paradise. Located on the Deccan Plateau in the south-eastern part of Karnataka\, Bangalore is India\'s third most populous city. There are a number of expats from across the world living in the city\, thanks to the growing presence of Multi-National Companies.
